website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Versitile II is really not a bad deal for its retail price of $75. It is a stylish, comfortable, and well-fitting basketball shoe that leaves most buyers satisfied with their purchase. However, its cheap-feeling materials may seem a bit uncomfortable and may also wear out quickly.All in all, there is very little to complain about its performance on the basketball court. However, don’t expect too much from these budget Nike basketball shoes. You’ll get precisely what 75 bucks has to offer.
pros: The Nike Air Versitile II looks phenomenal according to a significant number of reviewers
They just love its sharp look and awesome design
Like the Hyperdunk X, most wearers are delighted that these Nike basketball shoes fit them perfectly
They are claiming that it fits like a glove
Some buyers are very satisfied with the shoe’s on-court performance
“This is one of the best pairs of basketball shoes I’ve ever owned,” one user comments
Several players are reporting that the Nike Air Versitile II is durable
These Nike basketball shoes are very comfortable, many wearers note
Users have the same praise for the 33rd Air Jordan
cons: One buyer is forced to return his Nike Air Versitile II because the Air unit popped
These basketball shoes wear out quickly, a few users are reporting
A handful of purchasers are claiming that these Nike basketball shoes feel cheap and uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: They look good but aren't very practical
customer_reviews.text: They look good but aren't very practical. First off they're mids not hightops as stated (they've since fixed/edited that). The back rubs against the worst part of the Achilles and has little padding, bball is out of the question in these. The traction is a joke and a dead giveaway they're not meant for the hardwood. Light, but also cheap, and not in a good way. These have become my gym shoes and are adequate for that, no bball though.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Good....but not great.
customer_reviews.text: They are not perfect but it's a great affordable shoe. You can see where Nike saved money on this shoe when you see and feel it in person. None of the logos are raised and everything feels like it's a $60 shoe. Horrible grip when playing on the court and had to wipe feet almost every play for better grip. I would say this is a better fashion sneaker than being used as game used shoes. I would recommend this shoe for daily use and that's about it. If you want something better, than go pay $200 for Jordans.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: The firm part of the shoe where the fabric meets the sole (its white in the picture) has become displaced and what feels like a hard metal bar now protrudes inside of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are already broken after 4 months!! I don't seem to have the option to return but for almost $200 I expect that Amazon and the seller should stand behind their product. The firm part of the shoe where the fabric meets the sole (its white in the picture) has become displaced and what feels like a hard metal bar now protrudes inside of the shoe making them impossible to put on. So angry. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Leaky left air pocket on 2 pairs... Defect???
customer_reviews.text: Got pair of shoes on time...the first time I tried them on, the left air pocket was leaking every step I would take.... very audible "air leak" sound. I immediately requested a replacement pair. The second pair showed up on time...the first time I tried them on, the left air pocket was also leaking in the replacement pair... I am keeping the second pair, since I need shoes to play b-ball, but I am not very happy with this product... I usually stay away from any Nike shoes with air pockets... and now I remember why.
customer_reviews.author: Wade C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were comfortable and amazing. I was able to walk on these for 10 hours without my feet hurting. Definitely buying another. Not to mention, my coworkers loved the look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Nava

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful! I ordered them for my husband for his birthday. They fit him perfectly, and he said they're very comfortable. The sizing was perfect. I'd definitely order these again for him. They look great on him too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Other than that this is a great looking shoe with lots of heel impact padding for ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was true to size, but a little too narrow for my foot if planning to wear 2 pair of socks as I do when working 10 hour days in the warehouse. Other than that this is a great looking shoe with lots of heel impact padding for use on concrete. great price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe with minor  imperfection
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them but whenever you step in the smallest amount of water they would squeak for the rest of the day . It drove him crazy
customer_reviews.author: Nikki simpson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit as expected - buy your typical sneaker size. They have good ankle support and look stylish with black and red contrast. They look great on the basketball court or with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this shoe. I play a lot of rec league basketball and I am a guard. I noticed a huge improvement in my quickness, explosion with these shoes' grip and light weight compared to my last shoe. Very happy. They seem to be good quality and believe they will hold up well for 2 seasons.

customer_reviews.title: Like a bunch
customer_reviews.text: My son like them so much he wanted me to order him the next size for next year.

customer_reviews.title: They are super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time with no issues. Fits so comfortable snug as a bug. I recommend you to buy these .....A1

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but tight fit all around.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sneaker. Fits tight though around the foot and ankle. If you have an 11 year old that is fussy about the fit of shoes and has a meltdown every single day about socks, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Basketball Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for my son's basketball season . Great Price .Ankle support & great grip
customer_reviews.author: BrianB

customer_reviews.title: Good option.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for a couple weeks and they feel comfortable. Also, they looking is Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: I ordered them for my grandson and he loved them. He said they were very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them for my grandson and he loved them. He said they were very comfortable. They look good and appear to be well made.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stability and comfort...my everyday shoe now...I’m too short for basketball

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: Laces had black marks and so did the front of the right shoe, Very disappointed, suppose to be a Christmas gift 🙁

customer_reviews.title: It was not terrible and didn’t warrant an exchange
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived with a small scuff on the side of the sole just below the Nike Swoosh. It was not terrible and didn’t warrant an exchange. Other than that the shoes were well worth the price and are exactly what I needed for basketball.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for basketball
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 pairs for myself and a friend, both fits good.
customer_reviews.author: AjRazguli

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth shoe. I like the design. Only problem with the shoe is it's very narrow so after long hours at work it can cut the blood circulation in my feet and leave them numb. Apart from that these shoes are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for an active 14 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My giant 6' 3 14 yr old son loves these shoes. He wears a 14 and finding shoes was a nightmare until we lucked out with these. Fits great and are very durable. We buy a pair about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He wears them every day and they have held up nicely.

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price.
customer_reviews.text: For this price. I will have to get a couple more. Plus they looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: kanden keo

customer_reviews.title: Shoes can be a bit tight.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are somewhat uncomfortable as they are a bit smaller than expected and moreover, they are not properly cushioned as it is expected from Nike. Although looks wise they look very good. The only negative point is that you have to compromise a bit in comfort, otherwise these are a good pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Vedant Barua

customer_reviews.title: Solid basketball shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball shoes for the price. My friends were surprised by how much I paid for these.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just don't have the same fit or feel as other Nike shoes I've purchased

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable, but still wearable.
customer_reviews.text: Good middle of the road pair of shoes for casual basketball.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t say they are the most comfortable to play basketball in
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected and are priced well. Wouldn’t say they are the most comfortable to play basketball in, but gets the job done. There isn’t much padding on the back part around the Achilles area. Did get complements on the looks though.

customer_reviews.title: great shoes

customer_reviews.text: Great Looking Sneaker, Got Compliments on the first day wearing them in Public. Repositioning of the Nike Logo is an Eye Catcher

customer_reviews.text: My son wears these shows daily. He likes the feel of them and has from day one. They are durable on the feet of my 15 year old running around constantly.

customer_reviews.title: THE same 9. 5US but it is a little ...

customer_reviews.text: The shoe has a hole in it after only a couple of times on the court. Terrible Product that breaks easily. Wish I could get a full Refund

customer_reviews.title: ... I should’ve gotten a wider size but overall a good shoe. Very comfortable

customer_reviews.text: it is hard to find size 15 to fit perfectly without trying them on. these fit perfectly and so far no complaints from the basketall player.

customer_reviews.text: Dont know how they fit. Wont wear them till they drop the new "P O S" spokesman. Love the looks of them though.

customer_reviews.text: Love the mesh concept for the top of the shoe. Helps provide some airflow into the shoe while your wearing it. The sole however doesn't have much arch support.

customer_reviews.title: Very not comfortable. If u have a normal or high rise ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned them because they were to small. For someone who has high hill/rise they were to small. Very not comfortable. If u have a normal or high rise stay away from these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Versitile Ii Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Built for the all-around player who demands comfort, cushioning and a locked-in feel, men's NIKE air versitile ii basketball shoe delivers. Fly wire cables provide midfoot stability, while a luxe heel package made from ultrasoft, foam-backed textile helps you feel contained
feature_bullets: Visible Air-Sole heel unit provides lightweight impact cushioning
Flywire cables provide stability and lockdown
Premium textile material provides incredibly soft comfort around the heel
Rubber outsole with modified herringbone pattern for traction
